meanings.definition: The scientific study of the chemical composition of celestial bodies.
meanings.sent1: Cosmochemistry involves analyzing the elements in stars and planets.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use cosmochemistry to understand the makeup of asteroids.
meanings.sent3: Studying cosmochemistry can reveal the secrets hidden in distant galaxies.
meanings.sent4: The mysteries of the universe unfold through the lens of cosmochemistry.
meanings.sent5: Through cosmochemistry, we explore the building blocks of the cosmos.

meanings.definition: The branch of chemistry that deals with the elements and compounds found in outer space.
meanings.sent1: Researchers in cosmochemistry study the unique compounds in meteorites.
meanings.sent2: Cosmochemistry helps us learn about the chemical makeup of comets.
meanings.sent3: The quirky field of cosmochemistry delves into extraterrestrial chemistry.
meanings.sent4: In the vast expanse of space, cosmochemistry uncovers hidden chemical treasures.
meanings.sent5: The wonders of the universe are unveiled through the lens of cosmochemistry.
